item.title: Rethinking Datastax Opscenter HA on AWS
item.author: dave@petzel.email (David Petzel)
item.description: Recently I’ve been working on building a highly available installation of Datastax Opscenter in an automated fashion on AWS. I’ve decided to abandon my pursuit of installing Opscenter with automatic fail over and will propose an alternate solution which I believe still achieves high availability as well as much better self-healing.
